title: Kardboard Kings: Card Shop Simulator
notes: Native controller support **Decky Plugin: Works out of the box**. **2.0 Standalone: Works out of the box**.
genre: Role-playing (RPG), Adventure, Strategy, Indie, Simulator, Visual Novel, Card & Board Game
description: Open your own Card shop by the seaside in Kardboard Kings: Card Shop Simulator! Buy, trade and sell Cards, or keep them for your own collection. Earn reputation with customers, beat your shop goals, unlock new decorations, and host exciting events to bring everyone to the best Card shop in town!
